# Household census

```{r}
library(stringr)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(modelsummary)
library(fixest)
```


```{r}
hh_census <-
  read_rds(
    file.path(
      path_box,
      "Data",
      "HouseholdCensus",
      "DataSets",
      "Final",
      "hh-census.rds"
    )
  )
```

## Number of observations

```{r}
hh_census %>%
  group_by(country) %>%
  summarise(
    N = n(), 
    `DSW (%)` = (mean(wp_dsw, na.rm = TRUE) * 100) %>% round(1),
    `ILC (%)` = (mean(wp_ilc_device, na.rm = TRUE) * 100) %>% round(1)
  )
```
